definitions.definition: to make something more modern or suitable for use now by adding new information or changing its design:
examples: an updated version of the software

definitions.definition: to give someone the most recent information:
examples: We'll update you on this news story throughout the day.

definitions.definition: an act of updating something or someone with new information:
examples: Jo's just doing an update on the mailing list.

definitions.definition: a new form of something that existed at an earlier time:
examples: It's an update of an old 60s movie.
